description: Providing services, support, and guidance to reduce the spread of COVID-19 in Philadelphia.
cleaned_text: services, support, and guidance to reduce the spread of COVID-19 in Philadelphia. The [Department of Public Health](https://www.phila.gov/departments/department-of-public-health/) leads Philadelphia's COVID-19 response. We provide services, support, and guidance to protect our residents from COVID-19. As part of this work, we: We're now learning to live with the coronavirus. We'll keep adapting our response so we can reduce new infections and prevent serious illness. You can help. Get vaccinated and stay home if you are sick. Wear a mask if you've been around people with COVID-19 recently. Together, we can protect ourselves and our community. |Address|| | Division of Disease Control 1101 Market St., 13th floor Philadelphia, PA
